DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : OTHER NEWS
DOC.TEXT: Mexico Launches Wheat Dumping Probe : The Commerce Ministry ruling to begin the inquiry into U.S. and Canadian wheat exported to Mexico comes_after the Mexican Agricultural Ministry presented documents considered to be evidence that wheat sold in Mexico has been unfairly subsidized . The U.S. companies accused of receiving subsidies are Farmland Industries Inc. , Cargill Inc. , Continental Grain Co. , Archer Daniels Midland Co. , Scoular Co. , Bunge Corp. , Louis Dreyfuss Corp. , Bartlett Co. , De Bruce Grain Inc. and Toepfer International .
